description: This file defines a React component named 'HelloWorld' used for a Remotion-based video project. It imports various Remotion APIs for video composition and animation, as well as custom components 'Logo', 'Title', and 'Subtitle'. It also uses 'zod' for schema validation of props. The component manages animations for logo translation and opacity and arranges video sequences and layout.

methods.name: HelloWorld
methods.description: React functional component that renders animated visual elements for a video, based on props validated with zod schema.
